channel.title: Sever help!
channel.description: when i log in it goes to 127.0.0.1 by it self and idk how to change it...another thing on every game that i downloaded when i put my sever in it never works? but the 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 works..but i downloaded hamachi and can i use that sever number it gives me and can my friends use that number to and we all play on the same sever??? plz help

item.title: Sever help!
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

alot of portforwarding tuts, i am going to tell u maybe a simplest guide…

  1. go to start>run>type in cmd >type in ipconfig > find your default gateway > it should be like 192.168.0.1 or something…>after
  2. go to ur internet browser and type in your defalt gateway…(the 192.168.0.1) thing… you should get a password screen… try admin for the username and leave the password blank… if that doesnt work, try using admin as the password and the username blank…
  3. once your logged into ur router, go to applications and gaming, and portforward to 43594 port, and your ip adress… (192.168.1.(xxx)
    next go to no-ip.com and set up the name ect. and hopefully u might understand the scrubby tut! lmaoo

Read full topic
